root.name: Take a Break! Pinball
root.description: OverviewTake a Break! Pinball is a pinball game developed by Dynamix and published by Sierra Entertainment for the PC platform. Take a Break! Pinball has eight different tables that are all based on other Sierra Entertainment properties. The eight tables included in the game are:Flipped Out WillyLarry's Big ScoreLots in SpaceNova 9Planet Xenon in the BeginningQuest for DaventryReformation DaySpaced Travel
